channel.title: CVE Feed for Ingeteam -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ingeteam -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3770|2024-08-02T07:08:50.119Z -- ingeteam -- ingepac%20da3451
item.description: Â Incorrect validation vulnerability of the data entered, allowing an attacker with access to the network on which the affected device is located to use the discovery port protocol (1925/UDP) to obtain device-specific information without the need for authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-3768|2024-08-02T07:08:49.809Z -- ingeteam -- ingepac%20da3451
item.description: Incorrect data input validation vulnerability, which could allow an attacker with access to the network to implement fuzzing techniques that would allow him to gain knowledge about specially crafted packets that would create a DoS condition through the MMS protocol when initiating communication, achieving a complete system reboot of the device and its services.

item.title: CVE-2023-3769|2024-08-02T07:08:49.937Z -- ingeteam -- ingepac%20fc5066
item.description: Incorrect data input validation vulnerability, which could allow an attacker with access to the network to implement fuzzing techniques that would allow him to gain knowledge about specially crafted packets that would create a DoS condition through the MMS protocol when initiating communication, achieving a complete system reboot of the device and its services.
